Summary: Dandelion shaped UFO. Glows blueish-green from center.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Winston-Salem
There were 2 other sightings in Winston-Salem on or around April 5th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving from Indiana to Durham, North Carolina. I have made that trip a hundred times with nothing unusual happening. I always go through this area about the same time when I make this trip. All I remember before the incident is that I was driving. THe next thing I know, I look over to my right and I say to myself, 'mmmph, I just saw a UFO'. I say it in a matter of fact way and I just go on driving like nothing happened. For some reason I reach for my cell phone and send my brother a message stating that I just saw a UFO. I seem to forget the whole thing. I arrive at the motel and I look at my watch and I think, 'Wow, it's 3 o'clock in the morning?'. I think, 'Boy, it took me alot longer to get here than I thought it would. I check in and go to bed. I get up the next morning go to work. I work for a couple of hours and my brother calls and askes me what I saw. For a minute or two, I don't know what he is talking about. I forgot the whole thing! After he ask me that question, it all came back to me! I can't believe I forgot about the UFO! I have always wanted to see one. I finally see one and I forget about it? That doesn't seem right to me. I am attaching a copy of a drawing that I made after talking to my brother that morning after the sighting. Also, after that sighting, I have made several changes to my life that I never thought of doing prior to this. Thank you for your time. Feel free to contact me if you wish. Thank you. Warren
